meanings.sent1: The movie was rated as the best by the critics.
meanings.sent2: She rated the books based on their popularity.
meanings.sent3: The cat rated the different toys in the room.
meanings.sent4: His performance was rated as a shining star in the show.
meanings.sent5: The teacher rated the students' essays with care and attention.

meanings.sent1: The chef rated the dishes before presenting them to the customers.
meanings.sent2: He rated her skills highly after seeing her work.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel rated the acorns for freshness.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication was rated as exceptional by her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The coach rated the players' performance after the game.

meanings.definition: Classified according to a standard scale
meanings.sent1: The hotel was rated as a five-star establishment.
meanings.sent2: The car was rated as one of the safest on the market.
meanings.sent3: The treehouse was rated as the coolest hangout spot.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was rated as the most elegant at the party.
meanings.sent5: The painting was rated as a masterpiece by the art critics.
